header.relationships: Close family, partners, very close friends
header.topics: Buying a car, festivals, relaxing, cowboy films, phones, textiles
header.activity: Having a cup of tea with mum, grandma and girlfriend
header.conv_type: Discussing, explaining, inquiring, complaining, anecdote telling

speaker.occupation: Artist/ Designer in residence at the Manchester College
